subject: Football
College Athletics
Bowl Games
organizations: Rutgers, The State University of New Jersey
lead_paragraph: When the Houston Bowl folded after last year’s game, Big 12 Conference officials turned to the Houston Texans’ owner Bob McNair to keep a bowl game in Houston.
snippet: When the Houston Bowl folded after last year’s game, Big 12 Conference officials turned to the Houston Texans’ owner Bob McNair to keep a bowl game in Houston.
